We love the 5 essentials of problem solving: experimenting, creating, innovating, learning and growing, which together constitute our primary goal. 
We design and develop mobile and web-based solutions. Our technology stack is on Android, iOS, Ruby on Rails, Angular JS, ReactJSHTML5, and CSS3.
